get.description: Returns data on all KPIs. There are no parameters for this API.

category_id.description: The id of the category the KPI is in

icon_id.description: The id of the icon to assign to the KPI

unit_id.description: The id of the unit of measure to assign to the KPI

target_default.description: The default target value for the KPI. If left blank or null the KPI will not have a target

value_direction.description: The value direction is case sensitive and can only be U(p), D(own) and N(one)

aggregate_function.description: The aggregate function determines how the KPI is calculated and can be either AVG (Average) or SUM (Total Sum)

sort_order.description: The display order of the KPI

is_active.description: Active KPIs can have date entered against them otherwise they are display only KPIs

is_calculated.description: Calculated KPIs cannot be amended via the API and must be added / amended in the interface

created_at.description: The UTC date and time the KPI was created. Date time format without timezone, e.g. `2019-01-01T00:00:00`

updated_at.description: The UTC date and time the KPI was updated. Date time format without timezone, e.g. `2019-01-01T00:00:00`
